name: European Business Services Round Table
goal: The European Business Services Round Table is a forum of European trade federations representing companies in the business-related services sector. It aims to provide a single point of reference in policy matters for this very diverse sector of the economy.
interests: Competition, Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market
euInitiatives: The interests of the services sector including the Services Directive, services in industrial policy and standardisation
